email.subject: Welcome Back
email.body:
Hello, #PLAYERNAME#. It would seem like the jailbreak was a success. You can thank the government for the lockdown. You can also thank them for your missing tools. It's been a year since the incident with Z3r0 and Project M. I think it's high time we got the group back together, yes?
You know the drill. I've linked everything below. hellSec is back in business.
-Quartz
